title: Bitz N Pizzas
description: A decentralized platform where individuals can discover, collect and sell rare digital art NFTs by creating rare pizzas. You can buy ingredient NFTs and trade them on the marketplace or Opensea.

title: DeSkillz
description: We’re disrupting the blockchain gaming ecosystem by providing a low-entry barrier for all players, developers and investors to have fun and earn revenue mutually.

title: NLP Education
description: Educators who join the NewsLitNation gain access to a supportive, collegial community of news literacy champions – and a space for exchanging conversation, ideas and best practices. Members also enjoy exclusive perks and incentives to support them in the classroom.

title: Checkology
description: Educators who join the NewsLitNation gain access to a supportive, collegial community of news literacy champions – and a space for exchanging conversation, ideas and best practices. Members also enjoy exclusive perks and incentives to support them in the classroom.

title: RealRepp
description: At RealREPP, our people are the foundation of our culture. As a nationally recognized & industry leading recruiting company, we are dedicated to providing excellent customer service and committed to creating a diverse, equal and inclusive workforce.

title: NHC Metaverse
description: The NHC metaverse is an alternate virtual experience that a user can go through once they visit the web marketplace. The virtual experience constitutes a metaverse that performs all the functionalities available on the website.
